prologue: ^Wait. *Where* am I? Why is it so dark here? The last thing I remember, is...
^Huh. I can't even remember who I am. That's strange.
^We call upon...irit world... welcome any kind... to talk with us.
^There are those chanting voices again. They're not talking to *me*, are they?
^I think they came from... that direction?

c-0: ^Who are those girls? Were they the ones chanting?
^We call upon the spirit world and welcome any kind spirits to talk to us.
^What are they doing? They're sitting in a circle on the floor.
^They look pretty focused. I don't think they've even noticed me entering.
^Wait, when did I enter? I can't remember opening the door. I was... in a dark place, then I decided to follow a voice, and now... I'm here?
^In a strange room that smells of incense and sage, covered in lit candles, where three teenage girls are sitting around a... board...
^We call upon the spirit world and welcome any kind spirits to talk to us.
^This isn't working. I told you this was a waste of time.
^Shut up, Amelia! It takes a little time before a spirit responds, okay?
^Again. Spirits. Aren't. Real. Why do your parents even *have* a Ouija board?
^W-we don't know that! Spirits could be real... So maybe one of them wants to talk to us? I-I think it's exciting!

^Come on, Natalie. You're only doing this because Zoey wants to. You're terrified of the idea of ghosts. Can you imagine *talking* to one? It's not too late to admit that you'd rather we make cocoa and grilled cheese and watch an anime.
^I-I don't know... I mean... No, I prefer Z-Zoey's idea!
^You're outvoted, Amelia! Drop the skepticism, okay? You're scaring the spirits!
^Sigh. Okay. But if nothing happens in ten minutes, I'm going home.
^Are there any ghosts with us now that want to speak to us?
^Q:Are there any ghosts with us now?
^Hmm.  So that's a Ouija board, huh? Should I try answering them?

c-1: ^This girl appears to be the de facto leader of the group.

c-2: ^That... doesn't make any sense at all in this context.

b: ^But why would a ghost tell us it's not here?
^Maybe it's not a ghost? Maybe it's... an invisible alien telepath?
^Are there any ghosts with us now that want to speak to us?

no_ghosts_here: ^Well, I mean, if there aren't any spirits here...
^You're the one who said there weren't any ghosts here, so clearly you tried to get the board to say the same thing!
^But... If I wanted you to believe there weren't any ghosts here, I wouldn't...
^Are there any ghosts with us now that want to speak to us?
there_are_ghosts_here: ^See? I told you there were spirits here!
^Wow. How convincing and not at all easy to fake.
^Stop bickering! The ghost is trying to talk to us!
^Fine. I'll play along. Talk to the "ghost", then.
^Did that happen because I answered their question?
^Do you want to ask the next question, Natalie?

b: ^I... can't remember, but I assume I am?

last_date: ^... why on Earth would you ask me that?
^Because I don't want to hold your hand in public.
^Because I don't want you to tell people we're together.
^I've told you, I don't mind that.
^Coming out is *hard*. You can't rush it. Especially not for *my* sake.
^As long as we're together, I don't mind that it's a secret to the rest of the world.
^... that would make us siblings. Yuck.
^Shut up! You know what I mean. I just wish I could talk to them about... this.
^It will happen when it happens. Don't worry about me. And I love you, too.
^Well, Amelia knows. That I'm seeing a girl, not *who* I'm seeing. But we talk about pretty much everything.
^I'm still not sure how to tell Zoey and Natalie, though.
^I'll tell Zoey if you tell Dad?
^No way... wait, what time is it?
^Damn. I promised Mum and Dad I'd be home for supper. I have to go.
^Yeah, but my top is soaking wet. No big deal, I'll wash it when I get home.
^You can't go outside like that, it's freezing out there. One moment, I'll get you something else.
^... you know there's zero chance I can fit into *any* of your clothes, right?
^Is that your brother's shirt? Won't he mind?
^Nah, he'll never notice. He'll get it back tomorrow, anyway.
^You're the best. Thanks for being my girl.
^I thought it was you! Are you headed for the bus stop?
^Yup. So what are *you* doing in this part of town?
^What do you mean? Don't you live, like, three miles from here? Did you just come here for no reason?
^No, I... I mean, I was visiting a friend!
^Uh, just my cousin. You don't know her.
^Have you been hooking up with Caleb?
^You *know* I have the biggest crush on him! I *told* you! I *trusted* you!
^Zoey, please! I'm not interested in him!
^You seriously think I don't recognize his shirt?
^Yes, it's Caleb's shirt, but... I haven't been hooking up with him, I swear!
^So why did you lie about it?
^(I have to get away from her!)
^(She's following me! Maybe I can lose her in the forest?)
^Stop! Do you really think you can...
^I swear I didn't... Give me a hand! Get a branch! Call someone! Something! Anything!
^Zoey...? You let me... drown? Freeze to death? How could you?
